thread.section_title: Bravofly.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bravofly.com | www.bravofly.com
thread.title: Jalil Bin Haji Md Yusof
thread.title_full: Bravofly.com reviewed by Jalil Bin Haji Md Yusof

author: Jalil Bin Haji Md Yusof
title: Jalil Bin Haji Md Yusof
text:
Very easy to book online airfare....lots of online payment option....thumb up. Once booking is confirmed... They told us airport terminal location on invoice flight details....thumb up.
Excess limit for baggage allowance (PAL express) for every passenger is 10kg only. I think need to add few Kg more otherwise excess baggage need to pay high eg PAL excess baggage check in 200 peso per Kg.
Email replying from Bravofly quite late takes time to get replying emails. That's the only problem I think
